entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
